text: Hey all, does anyone knows why the *Billing Start Date* *field* ( in the *Line Item* section) when selected with either value *At payment* or *Custom Date* does not trigger the webhook ? I checked to subscribe this field but cannot find it either. The other 2 options *Delayed start (days)* and *Delayed start (months)* work just fine.
Hi there. I'm having similar trouble. Did you ever get this to work?
